1.0.1.en: Fix authentication scope and home resume schedule button

1.0.2.en: Support date tag in gas meter reproting flow. Add support for duration in home/room boost action flows.

1.0.3.en: Do not change target temp when turning off heating.

1.1.0.en: Update app description and flow card titles. Add support for boost heating button (Home, Room). Add heating power sensor (Room).

1.1.3.en: Added new smart schedule status conditional flow for rooms.

1.2.0.en: Added room open window detection and early start configuration. Minor bugixes.

1.2.1.en: Update tado client to latest version.

1.2.2.en: Added flow action to set geopresence mode and flow trigger on changed geopresence mode.

1.2.3.en: Fix error when energyIQ was disabled for home.

2.0.0.en: Added support for Tado X generation homes.

2.1.0.en: Improve session naming and error handing. Disable devices when re-authentication is unavoidable.
